title: Can anyone help?
body:
Hello,
I have a problem with im thinking the client but could be my laptop and i am completely unsure on how to fix this problem.
Whenever I go into the client, everything works fine. As soon as I go into the game, 70% of the time, my whole computer freezes/crashes and i cant tab out or do anything.
I have tried multiple things including: updating graphics card, turning graphics down in game, reinstalling the client.
If anyone knows anything that may help, please post something.

Thanks!       
{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
If this has happened only recently and you're on Windows 10, it could be related to some problems with the Anniversary updates that rolled out a few days ago. If this is the case, I recommend [rolling back those updates](http://www.howtogeek.com/235474/how-to-roll-back-builds-and-uninstall-updates-on-windows-10/) to see if it resolves the issue.

If that doesn't help or if you're not on Windows 10, your issue is most likely caused by driver problems or hardware issue. In this case, I recommend working through our [Bugsplat & Crash guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) to address the most common solutions for this problem.

Let me know if you still have this issue after working through those steps.
